content.raw:
I agree.  Although indirectly are included in the dependencies of Ignition Gazebo, Ign Physics and Ign rendering are tightly related. But they are dependencies. It uses other ignition libraries also.   
  
Maybe the best definition is  
”Ignition Sensors is used in conjunction with \[Ignition libraries\]\([https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs](https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs)\). Especially relies on rendering capabilities from \[Ignition Rendering\]\([https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs/rendering](https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs/rendering)\) and physics data from \[Ignition Physics\]\([https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs/physics](https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs/physics)\).”
content.html:
I agree. Although indirectly are included in the dependencies of Ignition Gazebo, Ign Physics and Ign rendering are tightly related. But they are dependencies. It uses other ignition libraries also.

Maybe the best definition is
”Ignition Sensors is used in conjunction with [Ignition libraries](https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs). Especially relies on rendering capabilities from [Ignition Rendering](https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs/rendering) and physics data from [Ignition Physics](https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs/physics).”
